(I have reached rank 1 in the past, and here are my thoughts on the game:) Dead by daylight on the surface looks just like a team game against a killer, kind of like overwatch or anything else. But as you play it more, ranking up and getting more perks and add-ons, you may begin to realize this game can begin to feel like chess. Players spend the game doing gens and running from the killer, yes, but they also have to guess what loadout the killer has, what perks he's using, and diffuse his hex perks before they bring about their downfall. Meanwhile, the killer has to learn how to end chases quickly, when to leave a chase, and how to guess where the survivors are at any moment. This game is just as fun on both sides, but I would say it gets considerably more difficult for the killer in the higher ranks, while survivor hits a sort of skill ceiling. This game is constantly being updated with new killers and maps, but I would personally prefer if the devs spent more time balancing the game instead of adding new content. Certain perks and items are slightly overpowered if used correctly, on both sides. All in all though, I'd give this game a solid 8/10,  I love it with all my heart and play it constantly, but there's definitely room for it to improve in some areas. If you're a fan of horror games and strategy, you may get a lot of enjoyment out of this one!

This game is enjoyable once you know how to play. When you get into your first game, it's so fun. The game keeps you on the toes with its mechanics. It's very easy to remember what perks do, and you have such a wide selection of them to choose from. It's especially fun with friends, who you can either be survivors with or go against each other in a custom game. I rarely ever play this game by myself because I don't see the appeal in playing killer though.
